output.absKeff: python3 -c "import serpentTools,glob; f=glob.glob('*_res.m')[0]; res=serpentTools.read(f); d=res.resdata['absKeff']; print(d[0] if d.ndim==1 else d[0,0])" 2>/dev/null || echo ''
output.absKeff_err: python3 -c "import serpentTools,glob; f=glob.glob('*_res.m')[0]; res=serpentTools.read(f); d=res.resdata['absKeff']; print(d[1] if d.ndim==1 else d[0,1])" 2>/dev/null || echo ''
